name: Regex Adventure
description:
Free Web Version Here Free Downloadable Demo Below Learn and master regex! Conquer your fear of them at last!

A puzzle game based around finding patterns!
Defeat goblins based on their names, but be careful to not harm fellow wizards! Go from complete beginner to Regular Expression master!

Demo: 8 levels Paid Version: 20+ additional levels More levels coming in the future!
Join the discord for help and updates: discord.gg/MM4Jm24wjR
Web Version (Only demo levels): https://goldenlion5648.itch.io/regex-adventure-browser
Install Instructions Windows

Download and unzip, then run RegexAdventureUnity.exe

Linux

Download and unzip, enter unzipped folder, from the terminal run
chmod +x WHAT_EVER_THE_FILE_IS.x86_64 ./WHAT_EVER_THE_FILE_IS.x86_64

MAC
  1. Open Terminal
  2. cd to the *.app folder
  3. xattr -rc *.app
  4. Double-click, it opens

Hidden keybinds
  • f1 hides name tags
  • ; toggles dark mode
